title: Poster, "Montréal 1976 - Olympic Games", 1972–76
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black lower left: Directeurs artistiques: Georges Huel et Pierre-Yves Pelletier  Graphiste: Yvon Laroche
inscribed: Imprinted in white upper left corner the registred logo of the Olympic Games. In black lower left corner, Copyright 1972, COJO 76. Litho Canada
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Dan Friedman
description: The five rings of the Olympic symbol are printed in white against a solid red background. They are shown as if reflected on water.  Montréal 1976  in black upper center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Montréal 1976 - Olympic Games", 1972–76.
1972–76. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-161.
